thread.title: Hardly Strictly blows music fans away, yet again
thread.title_full: Hardly Strictly blows music fans away, yet again - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Aidin Vaziri
title: Hardly Strictly blows music fans away, yet again
text:
Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle Michael Franti goes out into the crowd filled meadow for a few songs, play the Banjo Stage, during the first day of Hardly Strictly Bluegrass in Golden Gate Park on Fri. October 2, 2015, in San Francisco, Calif., Michael Franti goes out into the crowd filled meadow for a few...
Huge gusts of wind rushed through Golden Gate Park on Saturday afternoon, blowing the hammering post-punk sounds of Paul Weller, the former front man of British rockers the Jam, into the frenzied acoustic folk of San Francisco’s Brothers Comatose.
